task.title: Analyzing data from paranormal investigation
task.shortdesc: Data that has recorded paranormal phenomenon often need to be adjusted before presenting.

context.p: Data collected from a paranormal investigation can be explored in multiple ways but often follow a common procedure

step.cmd: Slow down, speed up, and/or change the tonal settings on audio to hear voices
Alter the lighting and color in images and video
Save alterations to a common source like USB or external hard drive
Present evidence for collaborative analysis with others
